metadata.description: Milo Ventimiglia (Heroes) and Russ Cundiff (Mall World) join forces to bring you REST, a pulse-pounding sci-fi thriller in the tradition of The Bourne Identity and The X-Files! REST tells the tale of John Barret, a white-collar New Yorker whose life changes when he becomes addicted to a drug that prevents him from falling asleep!
metadata.name: Rest, Vol. 1
